inclusion.criterion: Primary confirmed distant metastatic breast cancer (M1)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A histologically proven diagnosis of the breast tumor

inclusion.criterion: A known hormonal and HER2Neu status
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is  HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.

inclusion.criterion: Having TNM classification: T1-T3, resectable T4 status, and N0-N3
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.

inclusion.criterion: performance status and comorbidity should allow surgery and/or systemic therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Accepting the surgery by written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.

exclusion.criterion: primary invasive breast cancer in the medical history
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: another malignancy within the last 10 years, besides basal cell carcinoma of the skin or early-stage cervical cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: surgical treatment and/or radiotherapy of the breast tumor before randomization
exclusion.label: not_met
